channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: Rick Steves' Europe
channel.desc: The Cornish culture in the far southwest of England; tin mining heritage; pirates' towns and fishing villages; Dartmoor National Park.

channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
channel.desc: A sighting of the mysteriously missing Baron Battenberg sends the press and police into a frenzy; determined to uncover the facts, Ruth and Sam go undercover at the Pranayama retreat, run by the Baron's widow Marion Grey and brother Edwin Battenberg.
